song.title: Duwa Maa Wage
song.content:
[Intro / Inter] -------------------- [| [A] | [-] | [-] | [-] | | [A] | [-] | [-] | [-] |] | [D] | [-] | [-] | [-] | | [D] | [-] | [-] | [-] | | [A] | [-] | [-] | [-] | | [A] | [-] | [-] | [-] |
[Chorus] -------------------------------------- [A] [A7] [D] Duwa maa wage neda naa amma waage [D] [G] [A] [G] | [D] | [A] | Danga kaara du kage do [A] [A7] [D] Duwa maa ge do ammage du nowedo [D] [E] [A] Kalupata du kage do
[Verse 1] -------------------------------------- [E] [D] Pasal noyanney wasa kammali ne [E] [A] Kalupata du......... kage do [E] [D] kalu ne sudui ne hari lassanai ne [E] [E7] [A] mage punchi doni maa wage
[Verse 2] -------------------------------------- [E] [D] Sellam karannai thawa sandu wennai [E] [A] podi malliyek....... onalu [E] [D] Du maa wagelu maa du wagelu [E] [E7] [A] Dennata denna yaluwo
